bzh.terrevirtuelle.navisuleapmotion.util

Class WSClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.java_websocket.WebSocketAdapter
      • org.java_websocket.client.WebSocketClient
        • bzh.terrevirtuelle.navisuleapmotion.util.WSClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.java_websocket.WebSocketListener

    public class WSClient
extends org.java_websocket.client.WebSocketClient
    Represents a WebSocketClient. Enables communication from RA_NaVisu to Navisu's Server

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.java_websocket.client.WebSocketClient

        org.java_websocket.client.WebSocketClient.WebSocketClientFactory

      • sendIP

        public void sendIP()
            throws java.nio.channels.NotYetConnectedException,
                   java.net.UnknownHostException
        Sends the device's IP on which this app is running to NaVisu Server. When the server receives this message, it will try to connect to the RA_Navisu server
        Throws:
        java.nio.channels.NotYetConnectedException - Thrown if the socket is not connected yet
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if the socket is connected to an unkown host

      • sendClose

        public void sendClose()
               throws java.nio.channels.NotYetConnectedException,
                      java.net.UnknownHostException
        Sends to NaVisu server to inform that the RA_Navisu server will be closing (initialize proper deconnection procedure in NaVisu client)
        Throws:
        java.nio.channels.NotYetConnectedException - Thrown if the socket is not connected yet
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if the socket is connected to an unkown host

      • ws_request

        public void ws_request()
                throws javax.naming.TimeLimitExceededException
        Sends a message to NaVisu server to ask information about Route0.nds
        Throws:
        javax.naming.TimeLimitExceededException - Thrown if timed out

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getListID_Rep()

        Returns:
        The Message List

        Sets the message list

      • handleRepStaticData

        private java.util.List<ARgeoData> handleRepStaticData()
                                               throws javax.naming.TimeLimitExceededException
        Try to gather ARgeoData on any message stored in listID_Rep (pop)
        Returns:
        The ARgeoData list
        Throws:
        javax.naming.TimeLimitExceededException - Thrown if after 100 trials, the function does not manage to get on message from the message list

      • response

        private java.util.List<ARgeoData> response(java.lang.String message)
        Unmarshall the ARgeoData from the message given in parameter
        Parameters:
        message - The message to unmarshall
        Returns:
        The ARgeoData list extracted from the message

      • getInstance

        public static WSClient getInstance()
        Returns an instance of WSClient connected to localhost
        Returns:
        An instance of WSClient. If the URI built from localhost is incorrect, null will be returned

      • getInstance

        public static WSClient getInstance(java.lang.String ip)
        Returns an instance of WSClient connected to the server whose IP is given in parameter
        Parameters:
        ip - The server's IP to connect to
        Returns:
        An instance of WSClient. If the URI built from the IP address is incorrect, null will be returned

      • getIPAddress

        public static java.lang.String getIPAddress(boolean useIPv4)
        Get IP address from first non-localhost interface
        Parameters:
        useIPv4 - true=return ipv4, false=return ipv6
        Returns:
        address or empty string
